title: meanwhile, the mods...
body:
"hmm lets see, we got CJ and his sock puppet account spamming hate threads and acting like a douche"
"we got nuerosurgeonwolf spamming nonstop about how no one will meet his high standards"
"we got plently of shitposters that had faced previous suspensions and are still at it"


"lets randomly ban ouroboro"
"and while we are at it, lets ban BFNA for posting a woman in a swimsuit"
